content.question: If <math alttext="f of x equals, 4 times x to the sixth power, minus 3 times x to the fourth power, plus 2 times x cubed, plus e squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="f prime of x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="4 times x to the fifth power, minus 3 times x cubed, plus 2 times x squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="24 times x to the fifth power, minus 12 times x cubed, plus 6 times x squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>24</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="24 times x to the fifth power, minus 12 times x cubed, plus 6 times x squared, plus 2 times e" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>24</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>e</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="24 times x to the sixth power, minus 12 times x to the fourth power, plus 6 times x cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>24</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="24 times x to the fifth power, minus 12 times x cubed, plus 6 times x squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>24</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>
